goal: Cost-efficient production-focused Dzine automation for RayviewsLab
last_completed_step: Task 2 — Stability: created ExploreGuard wrapper to cap screenshots/DOM dumps
next_step: Ready for production runs. Use dzine_quickstart_rayviewslab.md as the canonical reference.

files_changed.description: Compact canonical guide (<2 pages) with 3 production workflows, model choice, camera settings, prompt templates, export settings
Minimal action map: 6 actions (close_dialogs, product_faithful, product_video, ray_avatar, download_result, export_canvas) with selectors and success criteria
ExploreGuard class: caps screenshots (default 10), observations (50), DOM elements (40). Writes full data to /tmp files, prints only compact summaries to stdout. Prevents context window overflow.
